org.cloudgraph.hbase.io

Interface RowReader

  • All Superinterfaces:
    RowOperation, RowState
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    GraphRowReader

    public interface RowReader
extends RowOperation
    Provides access to the operational, configuration and other state information required for read operations on a single graph row.

    Acts as a single component within a TableReader container and encapsulates the HBase client Get operation for use in read operations across multiple logical entities within a graph row.

    Since:
    0.5.1
    Author:
    Scott Cinnamond
    See Also:
    TableReader
